topic: Deep dive: _bz2 standard library module in Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: Deep dive: _bz2 standard library module in Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Deep Dive: bz2 Standard Library Module in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This explainer provides a comprehensive overview of the enhanced features and functionalities of the bz2 standard library module in Python 3.12+.
key_points: Improved compression efficiency and decompression speed
New bz2file class for handling both compression and decompression
Support for large files (up to 2^64 bytes)
Ability to seek within a compressed file

code_examples.code:
with bz2file('input.txt.bz2', 'r') as f:
    content = f.read()

version_notes: Improvements to the compression algorithm for better performance
caveats: Not all platforms support the large file interface
The bz2 module is not as efficient as other compression libraries like zlib or gzip for small files
